doc.field: Sure, the high cost of living. You know all about that. Overpriced apartments, expensive bar tabs, roommates who run...
Over 100 domestic and imported beers are the draw at this more than 50-year-old Hofbrau, with communal tables as well...
A Tenderloin hofbrau that serves hearty portions of all-American fare at rock-bottom prices.
Cafeteria-style San Francisco landmark dishes up lots of meat. For carnivores, a good time is guaranteed.
